titleStmt.title: A comfortable meditation of humane frailtie, and divine mercie in two sermons upon Psalme 146.4. and Psalme. 51.17. The one chiefly occasioned by the death of Katharine, youngest daughter of Mr. Thomas Harlakenden of Earles-Cone in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Williamson, Thomas, 1593-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Iames Boler, dvvelling at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; some leaves stained and cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Marigold in Pauls church-yard
